DOC.brief_summary: Purpose The TARGET All comer trial prospective , multicenter , randomize , two-arm , non-inferiority , open-label study 1656 patient 20 center Europe . The study `` real world , comer '' study .
DOC.brief_title: Non-inferiority Study Comparing Firehawk Stent With Abbott Xience Family Stent ( TARGET-AC )
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective : compare MicroPort Medical ( Group ) Co. , Ltd Firehawkâ„¢cobalt chromium coronary stent ( rapamycin target elute ) system abluminal groove contain biodegradable polymer Abbott XIENCE family EES ( Everolimus-Eluting stent ) system respect cardiac death , myocardial infarction ( clearly attributable non-target vessel ) , Target Lesion Revascularization 1 year `` real world '' patient population .
DOC.criteria: Minimal age 18 year Symptomatic coronary artery disease Patient acceptable candidate treatment drug elute stent accordance applicable guideline Presence one coronary artery stenosis > 50 % reference diameter 2.254.0mm cover one multiple stent Patient indication , lesion length vessel diameter accord 'Instructions Use ' study stent Patient willing able cooperate study procedure require follow visit patient legal representative inform agree sign EC approve write informed consent Women childbearing potential negative pregnancy test within 7 day procedure woman lactate Known intolerance aspirin , clopidogrel ticlopidin , heparin , cobalt , nickel , chromium , molybdenum , polymer coating , Sirolimus , Everolimus , contrast material Participating trial reach primary endpoint Planned surgery within 6 month PCI unless dual antiplatelet therapy maintain throughout perisurgical period .
